thread.title: ‘Should Be Sued For Fraud’ — Matt Drudge Unloads On Republicans
thread.title_full: ‘Should Be Sued For Fraud’ — Matt Drudge Unloads On Republicans

author: Peter Hasson
title: ‘Should Be Sued For Fraud’ — Matt Drudge Unloads On Republicans
text:
5469257 
Matt Drudge unloaded on Republicans Wednesday, saying they should be “sued for fraud.” News reporter Matt Drudge attends the White House Correspondents' Dinner at the Washington Hilton Hotel on April 30, 2005 in Washington D.C. (Photo by Evan Agostini/Getty Images) 
The proprietor of popular news aggregator The Drudge Report, Matt Drudge is known for his secrecy and rarely gives his personal opinion on political issues. 
He made an exception on Wednesday, unleashing on Twitter against congressional Republicans for what he felt was a lack of real action. Screenshot/Twitter 
Drudge claimed Republicans “Only know how to be opposition not lead!” and pointed to the lack of an Obamacare repeal as an example. He followed up by saying the “Republican party should be sued for fraud,” urging lawmakers to get “Back to basics.” Screenshot/Twitter 
Drudge is widely considered one of the most influential people in American politics for the way his site drives coverage of political issues.
